item.title: Elon Musk Accidentally Unleashes MechaHitler
item.description: Grok garbage in, Grok garbage out.

item.title: The Eternally Unrealized MAGA Crack-Up
item.description: The bitterness of the very online right is unlikely to register with the vast majority of GOP voters.

item.title: DEI Isn’t Dead Yet at the University of Wisconsin
item.description: Until UW–Madison fully dissolves its DEI apparatus, divisive ideologies and petty bureaucrats will continue to have too much influence on campus.

item.title: Justice Jackson, Opinion Journalist
item.description: The Supreme Court isn’t the proper venue for Ketanji Brown Jackson’s ‘feelings.’

item.title: Alienating South Korea and Japan Is a Strategic Blunder
item.description: High tariffs on the two nations will drive a wedge between America and its strongest allies in the Indo-Pacific region.
